title: Reasons for eating fast food in the U.S. as of August 2014
summary: This statistic shows the Reasons five for in eating fast on food U.S. in the August as forecasted by professional chefs for 2014 .
During the survey , 67.2 % of the respondents stated that Convenient items ( e.g
Asian-flavored syrups , Chorizo scrambled eggs , coconut milk pancakes ) would be a `` hot trend '' for food U.S. in 2014 .
gold: This statistic shows the reasons for eating fast food in the United States as of August 2014 . During the survey , 13.2 percent of respondents said that they ate fast food because they lacked other options .
